page1.title: Welcome to VibeKit
page1.description: Discover amazing features and capabilities that will enhance your daily experience.

page2.title: Stay Connected
page2.description: Connect with friends, share moments, and stay updated with what matters most to you.

page3.title: Get Started Today
page3.description: Ready to begin your journey? Let's explore everything VibeKit has to offer.

home.title: Welcome to VibeKit
home.subtitle: Your personalized dashboard
home.quickActionsDescription: This is where you can add quick actions, recent activity, or any other content for your home screen.
home.recentActivityDescription: No recent activity to show. Start exploring the app to see updates here.
home.reviewAppDescription: Help us improve by sharing your feedback
home.reviewError: Unable to show review at this time
home.reviewUnavailable: In-app review is not available on this platform
home.toastNotificationsDescription: Test different types of toast notifications

error.title: Error!
error.message: Something went wrong. Please try again

info.title: Information
info.message: Here's some useful information for you

walkthrough.title: Step-by-Step Walkthrough
walkthrough.description: Learn how to use VibeKit with our interactive tutorial that guides you through each feature
walkthrough.webNotSupported: Interactive walkthrough is only available on mobile devices. On web, you can explore the features manually.
walkthrough.step1: This is your home screen header. Here you can see the app title and access your profile.
walkthrough.step2: Tap this profile button to view and edit your personal information, including your profile picture.
walkthrough.step3: This counter shows how many times you've opened the app. It's a simple way to track your engagement.
walkthrough.step4: Toast notifications are temporary messages that appear at the top of the screen. Try the different types to see how they work.
walkthrough.step5: Use this section to rate and review the app. Your feedback helps us improve the experience for everyone.
walkthrough.step6: This walkthrough feature helps new users learn how to navigate and use the app effectively. You can restart it anytime!
walkthrough.step7: RevenueCat integration allows you to manage subscriptions and unlock premium features. Try the paywall to see how it works!
walkthrough.step8: Share VibeKit with your friends and family using the native sharing capabilities of your device. Spread the word!

shareApp.title: Share VibeKit
shareApp.description: Love VibeKit App? Share it with your friends and family using your device's native sharing capabilities. Help us grow our community!
shareApp.shareError: Unable to share at this time
shareApp.shareUnavailable: Sharing is not available on this platform

profile.choosePhotoSource: Choose how you'd like to add your photo
profile.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

revenuecat.title: RevenueCat Integration
revenuecat.description: Unlock premium features with our subscription plans. Experience the full potential of VibeKit with exclusive content and advanced functionality.
revenuecat.purchaseSuccessMessage: Welcome to VibeKit Premium! Enjoy your new features.
revenuecat.purchaseErrorMessage: There was an issue processing your purchase. Please try again.
revenuecat.mockPaywallDescription: This is a mock paywall for demonstration purposes. In a real app with RevenueCat configured, this would show actual subscription options and handle real purchases.
revenuecat.mockPurchaseMessage: This is a demonstration. To test real purchases, export this project and configure RevenueCat with your API keys.
